keyMoments.title: Creates Memory Illusions
keyMoments.description: Noko reveals his ability to create illusions from stolen memories, manifesting past allies and enemies as purple smoke projections to distract the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the full extent of Noko's memory manipulation abilities.

keyMoments.title: Steals All Remaining Memories
keyMoments.description: Noko unleashes his ultimate attack, a blue-white wave that paralyzes the crew and steals all their remaining memories completely.
keyMoments.significance: The peak of Noko's power and the climax of his villainous plan.

keyMoments.title: Sennenryu Transformation
keyMoments.description: After absorbing the crew's memories, Noko inflates dramatically and floats, believing he has finally achieved his dream of becoming a Sennenryu (Millennial Dragon).
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Noko's true motivation and showcases his tragic misunderstanding of transformation. Connects to the Warship Island arc's Sennenryu lore.

keyMoments.title: Defeat by Luffy
keyMoments.description: Luffy defeats Noko with a decisive blow, forcing him to release all stolen memories back to their owners and ending the Ocean's Dream Arc's main conflict.
keyMoments.significance: Noko's defeat resolves the memory crisis and marks the end of his misguided quest to become a dragon.

abilities.description: Noko can enter victims' dreams while they sleep through sounds, allowing him to steal memories.
By gazing into someone's eyes, Noko can control their actions and manipulate them.
Noko exhales purple smoke that creates illusions of people from stolen memories, manifesting past allies and enemies.
Noko's ultimate attack releases a blue-white wave that paralyzes targets and steals all their memories completely.

relationships.description: Noko hypnotically controlled Drim to help him steal memories from islanders and travelers.

evolutionMoments.description: Drim is freed from Noko's control when Noko is defeated by Luffy.

reveals.information: Noko's true goal was to become a Sennenryu (Millennial Dragon) by inflating and floating

keyMoments.title: Freed from Hypnosis
keyMoments.description: With Noko defeated, Drim is released from the seahorse's hypnotic control and has no memory of his actions while manipulated.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Drim's innocence - he was a victim rather than a willing accomplice.

keyMoments.title: Reunites with Mother
keyMoments.description: Freed from Noko's control, Drim has an emotional reunion with his mother on Ruluka Island.
keyMoments.significance: Provides closure to Drim's storyline and shows the restoration of normal life after Noko's defeat.

relationships.description: Drim was hypnotically controlled by Noko and used as a puppet to steal memories.

evolutionMoments.description: Drim is freed from Noko's hypnotic control when Noko is defeated.

reveals.information: Drim had no conscious memory or control of his actions while under Noko's hypnosis

keyMoments.title: Instinctive Fighting Despite Amnesia
keyMoments.description: Even with complete memory loss, Luffy's body instinctively uses his rubber powers to attack Noko, demonstrating that his fighting spirit transcends conscious memory.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the depth of Luffy's bonds and instincts - his body 'remembers' even when his mind doesn't.

keyMoments.title: Second Memory Restoration
keyMoments.description: For the second time in the arc, Luffy regains his memories when Noko releases them under physical duress.
keyMoments.significance: The turning point that allows Luffy to consciously defeat Noko.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Noko and Ends the Arc
keyMoments.description: Luffy delivers the decisive blow that defeats Noko, releasing all stolen memories and resolving the Ocean's Dream Arc.
keyMoments.significance: Resolves the five-episode arc and saves both his crew and the island's inhabitants.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Earlier Memory Recovery
keyMoments.description: Zoro reveals that he actually regained his memory earlier when Noko coughed it up, and had been waiting tactically for the right moment to act.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Zoro's strategic thinking beyond just combat prowess.

reveals.information: Zoro can maintain tactical awareness and hide his recovered memory to wait for optimal timing
